Pydio 8.2.2 was successfully installed!

This is a bugfix and security release for Pydio 8.X, see the Changelog below for commits details.
  • Missing hook for filter_boot.conf (details)
  • Fix /. and /.. entries on specific mount points (details)
  • Fix share files on S3 root (details)
  • Check zipBrowsingEnabled() when assigning ajxp_browsable_archive mimetype. (details)
  • Fix upload on mobile apps (details)
  • Hard-coded CORS support - to be added via a proper PSR-7 middleware (details)
  • Escaping mount type (details)
  • PSR-7 middleware for CORS requests (details)
  • Latest changes for CORS middleware (details)
  • Making it configurable (details)
  • Fixing order or middlewares and default values (details)
  • Adding to the release note (details)
  • Add new api 2 for migration to cells (details)
  • Fix api2migration json (details)
  • fix counting function (details)
  • Change how we set up the Antivirus scanner command (details)
  • Fix sanitization in odf iframe (details)
  • Use imports (details)
  • Fix missing Download All button on minisite (details)
  • Make sure meta.monitor_fs is shown as experimental - Fix preferences serial/deserialization (details)
  • Update api2.json with shares API's (details)
  • Fix Quota computing that doubles quota uisage Refix preferences (details)
  • Unserialize second parameter is not supported before php 7 (details)
  • From parameter is not used in send_mail action (details)
  • Update user session if admin is editing himself. (details)
  • Change indexes on ajxp_feed. (details)
  • Put all executable paths inside config files (details)
